column5: A friend of mine said she drives by this plaza in Kitchener on Albert Street near Philip and notices a portable sign that says there is a tackle store opening up there in March.  It's close to where I work so I'm happy!  Hoping it's a nice shop.   Just an FYI for K-W anglers.
Thatd be sweet cuz both now are a ways of a drive from me. Im gonna keep an eye out.
It is called fishing Fanatics. And i know the guys who run it and they r really nice guys.     jordan
I have had the chance to meet the Finactics and would like to wish them the best at their new location. They are great guys and very knowledgeable.
Can't wait to check them out. We need some alternative choices now that Rainbow Tackle is gone.

There is a place in Guelph on Hwy 7 near the Hanlon, I think it's new as well, drove past it the other day, first time I've seen it, don't know if it's new or not but I will be checking both places out. Hope they both prosper.

Fishing Fanatics, eh?  That's a cool name.  I wish the boys luck.  I always thought that for a place the size of K-W, it was short a tackle store or two.  Natural Sports is a great store (IMHO) with a good stock of specialty stuff, and now it sounds like there's gonna be a a place for people who live on the other side of town.
Rainbow is back open under new management....
Thanks for the info... maybe it will give the guys at Natural sports a little run and bring prices in line a bit.  Always want to support the local guys instead of the big onese like BPS.  Ken
Jordan and Bob we appreciate the compliments.  It’s nice to hear the interest and we’re looking forward to meeting everyone.  We’ll be opening March 10th, can’t wait!!
Sounds good the more the merrier. Just gotta luv the competition this could spark, eh!.
Excellent news, well that there is a new store.....not that Rainbow has re-opened.  :-)

Hello everyone!  I am also one of the Fanatics.  It is great to see all the interest in our store.  Being nuts about fishing is what Fanatics is all about, and I can assure you that we are all very avid anglers.  Jordan is one of my fishing buddies, I netted that big buck in his avatar after it put up quite a spirited fight.
Good luck with the store guys.If i am ever that way i will stop in and say hi.
